title: 289: CHATTY BROS: Katie’s Finale + Blake/Greg/Justin Breakdown + Gray Watched Erik’s Episode
itunes:title: 289: CHATTY BROS: Katie’s Finale + Blake/Greg/Justin Breakdown + Gray Watched Erik’s Episode
description:
The Bros are back and Evan and Grayston sit down to cheers and chat about Katie’s final Bachelorette episodes and more! They discuss Aunt Lindsay, final thoughts on Greg’s exit/AFR, the passion of Blake/Katie, Justin’s journey, Bachelor role play, Gray’s thoughts on The Broads episode with Erik (Bekah’s best first date), parenting and more! 

GET TICKETS TO THE LIVE ONLINE “ALMOST PARADISE” aka BIP BREAKDOWN SHOW HERE: https://app.loopedlive.com/c/3679

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***DIPSEA: Get an extended 30-day free trial when you go to DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY

***CUYANA: Get 10% off your first order over $150 plus free shipping at CUYANA.COM/CHATTY to get your individual code!

***BABBEL: go to BABBEL.COM and use promo code CHATTY for an extra 3 months free! 

 

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE:
